Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の子
Entry.EnglishText: Boy

Entry.JapaneseText: おじいさん
Entry.EnglishText: Old Man

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン・民家
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen - Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: <icon:20> つまみ食い
Entry.EnglishText: <icon:20>Sneak a Bite

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>、<Annie>が呼んでいる。 おまえの力が必要らしい。
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>, <Annie>'s asking for you. She needs your powers.

Entry.JapaneseText: えっ……？
Entry.EnglishText: Huh...?

Entry.JapaneseText: とにかく来てくれ！
Entry.EnglishText: Just come with me!

Entry.JapaneseText: とりあえず、ここは 手が空いたらでいいわ。 他にもっと重傷の人がいるはず……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sure there are serious patients you need to tend to. You can come back here after you've cared for them.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミーシャが<Annie>を 探してたわよ!?
Entry.EnglishText: Misha is looking for <Annie>!

Entry.JapaneseText: おじさん、なんでヒューマは ガジュマを嫌うの？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey mister, why do Huma hate Gajuma?

Entry.JapaneseText: オレ、前はヒューマの事、 嫌いじゃなかったけど、 今は嫌いになっちゃったよ……
Entry.EnglishText: I used to not hate Huma, but now I'm starting to...

Entry.JapaneseText: あっち行けよ！ オレ、この前、何にもしてないのに ヒューマたちにぶたれたんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Go away! I got hit by some Huma the other day for no reason!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマなんて嫌いだ！
Entry.EnglishText: I hate Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: オレわかるんだ……お姉さん、 他のヒューマと同じ顔だね…… ガジュマの事、嫌いって顔だね……
Entry.EnglishText: I can tell from your expression that you hate Gajuma just like the rest of the Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでそんな恐い目で オレを見るんだよ…… や、やめてよね……
Entry.EnglishText: Why are you looking at me like that...? G-Go away...!

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、お姉さんたちって ガジュマも助けてるんだよね？ どうして？ イヤじゃないの？
Entry.EnglishText: You helped Gajuma? But why? Don't you hate them?

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、お兄さんたちって ガジュマも助けてるんだよね？ どうして？ イヤじゃないの？
Entry.EnglishText: You helped Gajuma? But why? Don't you hate them?
Entry.Notes: basically the same as previous, no real reason to have different text

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>幻の庭<White>……確か、 キョグエンのほうにあると 聞いた事はあるがのう……
Entry.EnglishText: The <Cyan>Garden of Illusions<White>... I've heard it was around Kyogen...

Entry.JapaneseText: この辺りには、そのような 言い伝えはないぞ……
Entry.EnglishText: We have no such legends around here...
Entry.Notes: is this connected to the previous, or is this if you're a huma?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……言わなきゃわからんかね！ ヒューマとは口もききたく ないんじゃよ！
Entry.EnglishText: ...Seems like you don't get it! I have nothing to say to a Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ワシだけじゃなかったんだ。 ヒューマに不満を持っとるのは！
Entry.EnglishText: ...I'm not the only one with a bone to pick with Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 軍が止めなければ、今ごろは 街からヒューマどもはいなく なっとったはずなのに……！
Entry.EnglishText: If the military hadn't shown up, this city'd be rid of Huma already!
Entry.Notes: not really sure what event this is referring to

Entry.JapaneseText: 軍を率いて来たミルハウストと 言う男は……ヒューマも厳しく 取り締まっとったわ……
Entry.EnglishText: That man who leads the Army, Milhaust, arrested Huma as well...

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃが、あれは建前だけで、 きっとすぐにヒューマを 解放したに違いない……
Entry.EnglishText: But I'm sure it's all for show. He probably releases them immediately.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……言わなきゃわからんかね！ ヒューマとは口もききたく ないんじゃよ！
Entry.EnglishText: ...Seems like you don't get it! I have nothing to say to a Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: こ、この兵士がウチの孫を 助けてくれたんじゃ……！ ヒューマなのにガジュマの子を!!
Entry.EnglishText: This Huma soldier saved my grandson, despite the fact that we're Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: たとえヒューマでも、 この人は恩人だ……
Entry.EnglishText: Now I am indebted to a Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえたち、早くこの人に 医者を呼んでやってくれ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hurry, call a doctor for this man!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ふ、ふん…… やる事が済んだら、 さっさと出て行くがいい……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Hmph. If you're done, then get out.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ここで何をするつもりだ！ ケガ人がおるんじゃ！ 邪魔だから出て行け！
Entry.EnglishText: ...What are you doing?! We've got an injured man here, don't make a nuisance of yourself!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマっていうのは どうにもえらそうでいかんな。
Entry.EnglishText: Huma are so full of themselves...

Entry.JapaneseText: よくヒューマと一緒に いられるもんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: How can you stand traveling with them...?

Entry.JapaneseText: …………ふん。 ヒューマくさくて かなわんな……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Hmph. I can't stand the stench of Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: あんただな、ベルサスで 女王陛下をお救いになった ガジュマの勇者と言うのは？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you the brave Gajuma that rescued the Queen in Belsas?

Entry.JapaneseText: いいえ、陛下を救ったのは 私の仲間のヒューマの若者です。
Entry.EnglishText: No, the one who saved the Queen was a young Huma man I'm traveling with.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……なに？ あんたの連れの ヒューマが救っただと？ し、信じられん……
Entry.EnglishText: ...What? Your Huma companion? That can't be...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……陛下を救ったのが ヒューマとは…… ううむ……なぜだ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...A Huma saved the Queen... But why...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……近寄るな！ 女王陛下を殺そうとした ヒューマの仲間どもが！
Entry.EnglishText: Get away! You're one of those Huma who tried to kill the Queen!

Entry.JapaneseText: 陛下がご無事だったとはいえ、 ワシはおまえたちヒューマを 絶対に許さん……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't care if Her Majesty is safe, I'll never forgive you Huma...!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ジルバ様は、 我々ガジュマの救世主だ……
Entry.EnglishText: Lady Zilva will be our savior...

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバ様ならきっと、 陛下とともに素晴らしい国を 作ってくださる……
Entry.EnglishText: Together with the Queen, she will create a wonderful country for us Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ふん。 もうすぐ、この国は ガジュマの国になる……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Hmph. This country will belong to Gajuma soon enough...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの顔を見るのも、 あとわずかだ……！
Entry.EnglishText: I only have to put up with you Huma a little longer...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 正義ヅラした軍隊が、 種族間の争いを収めるために ウロウロしとるらしいな。
Entry.EnglishText: I've heard that our "righteous" army has been going around putting down any interracial conflicts.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今度はミナール辺りかもな。
Entry.EnglishText: I hear they're near Minal at the moment.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、くだらん話だ。 そんな事をしても何にもなるまい。 どうせ我らガジュマの時代が 来るんだからな。
Entry.EnglishText: But their efforts are meaningless. The era of Gajuma will soon be upon us.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ふん。 もうすぐ、この国は ガジュマの国になる……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Hmph. This country will belong to Gajuma soon enough...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの顔を見るのも、 あとわずかだ……！
Entry.EnglishText: I only have to put up with you Huma a little longer...!

Entry.JapaneseText: この音……ヒューマめが 何か企んどるな!?
Entry.EnglishText: What is this sound...? Are the Huma up to something?!
Entry.Notes: this is about the earthquake right? or is it just sound?

Entry.JapaneseText: この音……ヒューマめ、 何を企んどる!?
Entry.EnglishText: What is this sound...? Are the Huma up to something?!
Entry.Notes: basically the same thing as previous box

Entry.JapaneseText: かつては「力のガジュマ、 知恵のヒューマ」と言われた 時代もあったかもしれん……
Entry.EnglishText: There may have once been a time when Gajuma were known for power and Huma were known for wisdom...
Entry.Notes: is this a common phrase used elsewhere?

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、今やガジュマは ヒューマと同等以上の知恵を 持っているんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: But now Gajuma possess wisdom on par with or greater than the Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ならば身体能力の分だけ、 ガジュマのほうが上だと 思わんかね？
Entry.EnglishText: With their already superior physical strength, are Gajuma not the superior race in every way?

Entry.JapaneseText: かつては「力のガジュマ、 知恵のヒューマ」と言われた 時代もあったかもしれん……
Entry.EnglishText: There may have once been a time when Gajuma were known for power and Huma were known for wisdom...

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、今やガジュマは ヒューマと同等以上の知恵を 持っているんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: But now Gajuma possess wisdom on par with or greater than the Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ならば身体能力の分だけ、 ガジュマのほうが優れた 種族って事だ！
Entry.EnglishText: With their already superior physical strength, are Gajuma not the superior race in every way?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……力にも知恵にも勝るもの…… 種族の別なくすばらしいもの…… それは……勇気だ！
Entry.EnglishText: ...If there's one thing both races possess in far greater amounts than strength and wisdom...it's courage!

Entry.JapaneseText: それを<Blue>漆黒の翼<White>の連中が 教えてくれた…… ありがとう、漆黒トリオ！
Entry.EnglishText: That's what the <Blue>Dark Wings<White> taught me... I owe a lot to them!

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたも早く、 そんなヒューマどもとは 手を切った方がいいぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: You'd be better off leaving those Huma behind.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、まったく…… ヒューマの顔を見てると ……ああ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: Grrr, when I see Huma I just... Rrragh...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 痛い、痛いよぉ……
Entry.EnglishText: Uugh...it hurts...

Entry.JapaneseText: 大した傷じゃありません。 大人の男が、これくらいで 泣かないでください。
Entry.EnglishText: Your wound is not that severe. A man your age can handle much more than this, so please do not cry.

Entry.JapaneseText: 消毒しますよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: I am going to apply some disinfectant now!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……し、しみるよぉ……
Entry.EnglishText: I-It stings...

Entry.JapaneseText: すぐに収まります。 ガマンしてください。
Entry.EnglishText: The pain will subside momentarily. Please bear with it just a little longer.

Entry.JapaneseText: 厳しい先生だなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: You're one strict doctor, huh...

Entry.JapaneseText: 痛いよぉ…… 薬が傷口にしみるよぉ……
Entry.EnglishText: Ouch...That medicine really stings.

Entry.JapaneseText: いてて…… 痛いよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Ow-ow-ow...!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: あっ♪ おいしそうなものがあるヨ！ ちょっと食べちゃおっと。
Entry.EnglishText: Ooh! Looks like there's something tasty over there! Lemme take a teeny tiny bite...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>『<item:2000000F>』を食べました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green> Ate "<item:2000000F>."

Entry.JapaneseText: ……好きな味だな……
Entry.EnglishText: ...I like this...

Entry.JapaneseText: うわぁ、おいしーい！
Entry.EnglishText: Woah! This is tasty~!

Entry.JapaneseText: いけるな……
Entry.EnglishText: Pretty good...

Entry.JapaneseText: この料理、好きだな……
Entry.EnglishText: I love this sort of cooking...

Entry.JapaneseText: うぅーん、ウマイ！ 料理のレパートリーに 加えないとな！
Entry.EnglishText: Ooh, this tastes delicious! I'll have to add it to my repertoire of recipes!

Entry.JapaneseText: やるわね、この味……
Entry.EnglishText: This tastes pretty good...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>『<item:2000000F>』のレシピを入手しました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>Obtained recipe for "<item:2000000F>"!

Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.Notes: DON'T EDIT THIS, IT'S A DUMMY ENTRY

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>『<item:2000000F>』がありました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>There's some "<item:2000000F>" here.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>……しかし、勝手に食べるのは どうかと思ったので遠慮しておきました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>Stealing food is rude, so you refrained from doing so.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『<item:2000000F>』 以前、<Mao>がつまみ食いをした。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0> - <item:2000000F> - <Mao> already snuck a bite of this.
